MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY20 and LL36 postcode areas of Machynlleth and Tywyn, affecting properties in Ceinws, Talyllyn, Corris and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations into the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:20PM on 31st October 2020
